trans-unit.source: Represents the exception thrown when XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schema validation errors and warnings are encountered in an XML document being validated.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationException"></xref> class with the exception message specified.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> description of the error condition.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationException"></xref> class with the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> objects specified.
This constructor is called by derived class constructors to initialize state in this type.
A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object.
A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> object.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationException"></xref> class with the exception message and original <xref:System.Exception> object that caused this exception specified.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> description of the error condition.
The original <xref:System.Exception> object that caused this exception.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationException"></xref> class with the exception message specified, and the original <xref:System.Exception> object, line number, and line position of the XML that cause this exception specified.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> description of the error condition.
The original <xref:System.Exception> object that caused this exception.
The line number of the XML that caused this exception.
The line position of the XML that caused this exception.

Constructs a new <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationException"></xref> object with the given <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> information that contains all the properties of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationException"></xref>.
<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>
Sets the XML node that causes the error.
Use the <xref:System.Exception.Source%2A> property instead.
The source object.
Gets the XML node that caused this <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationException"></xref>.

When an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationException> is thrown during validation of a class that implements the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> interface such as the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> or <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> class, the object returned by the SourceObject property is an instance of a class that implements the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> interface.
When an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationException> is thrown during validation by a validating <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object, the value of the SourceObject property is `null`.
The XML node that caused this <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationException"></xref>.
